content: एध् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (एधते, एधांचक्रे, ऐधिष्ट, ए धितुं, एधित) {@--1@} To grow, increase; विनापि संगमं स्त्रीणां कवीनां सुखमेधते <ls>Pt. 2. 164.</ls> {@--2@} To prosper, become happy, live in comfort. द्वावेतौ सुखमेधेते <ls>Pt. 1. 318.</ls> {@--3@} To grow strong, become great. {@--4@} To extend. {@--5@} To swell, rise. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to grow or increase; to greet, celebrate, honour; नैदिधः स्वपराक्रमं <ls>Bk. 15. 19</ls>; (तां) आशीर्भिरेधयामासुः <ls>Ku. 6. 90.</ls> {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} एदिधिषते
